mapper.select: SELECT g.odSeq ,g.odCount ,g.odTotalPrice ,g.odReturnNy ,g.odRegDate ,g.ship_spSeq ,g.member_mmSeq ,a.spName ,a.spStart ,a.spSeq ,m.mmName ,m.mmEmail ,s.path FROM orders g LEFT JOIN ship a ON g.ship_spSeq = a.spSeq left join member m on m.mmSeq = g.member_mmSeq left join imginsert_ship s on s.pSeq = a.spSeq and s.sort = 1 WHERE 1=1

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT g.odSeq) FROM orders g LEFT JOIN ship a ON g.ship_spSeq = a.spSeq left join member m on m.mmSeq = g.member_mmSeq left join imginsert_ship s on s.pSeq = a.spSeq and s.sort = 1 WHERE 1=1
SELECT a.spSeq ,a.spName ,a.spStart ,a.spEatNy ,a.spRentalNy ,a.spRemain ,a.spPrice ,d.ptName ,d.ptAddress FROM ship a LEFT JOIN port d ON a.port_ptSeq = d.ptSeq WHERE 1=1 AND a.spSeq = #{spSeq}

SELECT g.odSeq ,g.odCount ,g.odTotalPrice ,g.odReturnNy ,g.odRegDate ,g.ship_spSeq ,g.member_mmSeq ,a.spName ,a.spStart ,a.spSeq ,s.path FROM orders g LEFT JOIN ship a ON g.ship_spSeq = a.spSeq left join imginsert_ship s on s.pSeq = a.spSeq WHERE 1=1 AND g.member_mmSeq = #{member_mmSeq} AND !(g.odReturnNy = 28) AND s.sort = 1

SELECT g.odSeq ,g.odCount ,g.odTotalPrice ,g.odReturnNy ,g.odRegDate ,g.ship_spSeq ,g.member_mmSeq ,a.spName ,a.spStart ,a.spSeq
ORDER BY g.odSeq Desc
